## Microsoft EDU Themes

Microsoft's EDU Themes for all to enjoy.

![Preview](https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/836bd001-fc1e-41ac-8fce-917bee5d1f0e/djur3af-cc3a7368-262e-47cb-bf77-1be5869a8338.jpg/v1/fill/w_1131,h_707,q_70,strp/windows_11_hidden_edu_themes_by_og_nimbi_djur3af-pre.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..C18g8Bm5eFun3yx7HF_9d77T50bxJ-zzthX4lmDtvyY)

{: .note }
> {: .opaque }
> Due to the amount of themes included in this suite and the size of some of the resources, these themes require manual installation. Please follow the instructions below to install the themes.

### Features

- Custom Cursors
- Supports 4k Resolutions

### Instructions

- Download and extract the archive via the download button below.
- Copy the contents of the `Themes` folder into `%LOCALAPPDATA%\Microsoft\Windows\Themes\`
- Apply the theme via `Settings > Personalization > Themes`

<a href="https://gitlab.com/the-back-room/deskthemepacks/sfw/edu-themes/-/archive/main/edu-themes-main.zip" class="btn btn--primary btn--lg" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Download Microsoft EDU Themes</a>
